doodlejump.peli

Class PlatformContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • doodlejump.peli.PlatformContainer

  • public class PlatformContainer
extends java.lang.Object
    A container and creator for the platforms. Also manages player interaction with platforms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlatformContainer(int windowWidth, int windowHeight, Player player)
      Creates a new container to create and hold the platforms that are then drawn on the screen

    • Method Summary

      void increaseDifficultylevel()
      Increases the difficulty level of the game in relation to player's score.

      Move platforms down when player character reaches the half of the screen.

      Generate new platforms from the initial array of platform types

        Parameters:
        player -

      • generatePlatforms

        public void generatePlatforms()
        Generates a new set of platforms on the screen according to the initial array of platform types given. Also puts the lowest platform under the Player when the game starts

      • moveAndCreatePlatforms

        public boolean moveAndCreatePlatforms(boolean addToScore,
                             Player player,
                             int width,
                             int height)
        Move platforms down when player character reaches the half of the screen. Platform are moved downwards a distance that reflects the remaining velocity of the player after he reaches the half of the screen.
        Parameters:
        addToScore - boolean that tells the program to either increase or not increase the score.
        player -
        width - is the width of the screen
        height - is the height of the screen
        Returns:
        true if platforms are moved downwards and score increases, or false if this does not happen.
